data.text: Sunday 19 August  The City of London Cemetery and Crematorium's  monthly tours. Learn all about this Grade I listed site on a history  walk around the grounds. The City of London Cemetery and Crematorium  (Manor Park), free, book ahead, 10am https://t.co/7zf1LGh6j5

Saturday 18 August BOTANICAL COCKTAIL MAKING: Make tinctures, syrups and infusions using freshly picked herbs and then learn how to use them to jazz up your drinks. The Culpeper (Aldgate), £25, book ahead, 9am-12pm https://t.co/YUD57Zj4o5

Friday 17 August MADONNA WORKOUT: In celebration of Her Madgesty's 60th birthday, PopFit is hosting a special class dedicated to the Queen of Pop. PopFit (London Fields), free, book ahead, 7.30pm https://t.co/4pxNfObFga
Thursday 16 August ESPRESSO MARTINI FESTIVAL Headquartered at the Old Truman Brewery (Shoreditch), £10, book ahead, 7pm-11pm, until 19 August https://t.co/HxENgOA22W
Wednesday 15 August Shappi Khorsandi headlines The Four Thieves' latest comedy night.  (Battersea), £7, book ahead, 8.30pm-10.30pm https://t.co/kQeRzYnamV

Tuesday 14 August CLUB YOGA: Not a fan of whale noises? Swap your usual yoga class for one with nightclub vibes.   Drink, Shop & Do (King's Cross), £5 charity donation, 6.30pm-7.30pm https://t.co/BaqzwG2vnj
